com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.view
Class VelocityTracker.Estimator

java.lang.Object
  com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.view.VelocityTracker.Estimator
Enclosing class:
VelocityTracker
public static final class VelocityTracker.Estimator
extends java.lang.Object

An estimator for the movements of a pointer based on a polynomial model. The last recorded position of the pointer is at time zero seconds. Past estimated positions are at negative times and future estimated positions are at positive times. First coefficient is position (in pixels), second is velocity (in pixels per second), third is acceleration (in pixels per second squared).

Field Summary
 float confidence
          Confidence (coefficient of determination), between 0 (no fit) and 1 (perfect fit).
 int degree
          Polynomial degree, or zero if only position information is available.
 float[] xCoeff
          Polynomial coefficients describing motion in X.
 float[] yCoeff
          Polynomial coefficients describing motion in Y.
